acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should not be able to create instances of an Abstract class even if the POJO has a full constructor
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldNotCreateInstancesOfAnAbstractClassEvenIfPojoHasFullConstructor

test-step.description: Given a Podam Factory with external factory
When I invoke the factory to manufacture <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.AbstractClass with the fullest constructor
Then the object should be null
Then the two objects 1 and 1 should be equal
Then the two objects class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.AbstractClass and class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.AbstractClass should be equal
Then the two objects 1 and 1 should be equal
